heroDescription: Join a community where learning English becomes fun and interactive. Rewrite sentences, get instant feedback, earn points and climb the leaderboard while connecting with learners from around the world.
helloMessage: Hello! How was your day? Let's practice pronouncing "Vocabulary".
responseMessage: It was great! I learned 5 new words today.
powerfulFeaturesDescription: Awesome features that help you improve quickly
topLearnersFeedback: See what our top learners are saying
smartSentenceDescription: Rewrite sentences with AI-powered feedback. Get instant corrections and improve your English writing skills with every attempt.
smartSentenceRewListeningDescription: Practice listening to English conversations and fill in the missing blanks to improve your listening skills.
smartSpeakingDescription: Practice speaking English with AI, receive feedback, and improve your pronunciation and communication skills.
socialInteractiveDescription: Connect with other learners, share your progress, and learn from each other in an Instagram-inspired social environment.
scoringRankingDescription: Earn points for accurate rewrites, compete with friends, and climb the global leaderboard to showcase your English skills.
aiSupportDescription: Get answers to all your questions, with explanations and guidance to help you better understand grammar and sentence structure. Additionally, receive suggestions to improve your skills.
chatDescription: Chat directly with friends and community members.
postDescription: Post, make friends, and share learning achievements with the community.
multilingualDescription: Multilingual support helps you learn more effectively.
activityNotificationDescription: New activity notifications and study reminders help you maintain your study habits.
startYourJourney: Ready to start your English journey?
ctaDescription: Join thousands of learners improving their English writing skills every day
